segments.text: Yes , but I will graduate from the Shanghai Finance and Trade school next month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure you can be a successful cashier ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure . You know my major is statistics and I get excellent records in all of the courses I have taken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's only for your theory foundation . I am afraid if you have ever handled large amounts of cash before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my father runs a business so I have opportunity to work in the finance department every holiday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I think you'll make a good cashier .
segments.speaker: S1
